text:
Grammy Award winning singer / songwriter John Legend and his wife, model Chrissy Teigen, are tossing their hats in the daytime talk show ring…

According to Star Magazine [Jan. 30 print edition] John and Chrissy are currently pitching a family oriented daytime talk show to feature interviews with celebrity guests and their kids.

A source close to the couple tell Star, “They believe they could cash in on their likability as a family to make this a huge success.”
title: John Legend and Chrissy Teigen Pitching Daytime Talk Show.
